db:abstract.db:para: Explains how to develop clients and recognizer plugins using QtSensorGestures.

db:section.db:title: Overview
db:section.db:para: The Emulator can be used for both creating client apps using Qt's built-in sensor gestures, and for creating customized recognizers.

db:section.db:title: Developing Sensor Gesture Clients
db:section.db:para: For instance, the Emulator can be used for writing a client app that needs to use the "slam" gesture.
Under the "Sensors" heading in the Emulator control, you will see an edit box for "Sensor gestures" that will contain a list of signals available when your client instantiates a QSensorGesture.
Select "slam", and then click the "Send" button to send a detected("slam") signal to the client.
